snippet.title: Steam Trailer | World of Sea Battle
snippet.description:
Sail, fight, upgrade, and trade alongside other players in an open-world MMO set in the Age of Sails. The game features dozens of historical sailing ships, pirates, PvP and PvE, player driven economy and guild wars for territory. Hoist the Jolly Roger and plunder yer way to glory on the high seas!
World of Sea Battle, registration in the game and download: https://www.worldofseabattle.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/54p2UCgf
Subscribe to our channel and participate in the life of the game:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsDAYnRa5cl0hSSf00e8hTQ?sub_confirmation=1
